data.text:

Fly Go First and save up to 50% on more than 2 million hotels, resorts, hostels, apartments and more worldwide!

What’s the must visit domestic destination you would recommend to someone?
Thank you #SurajWaghule #VijayaHegde #FaisalParmar #NikitaChhabria for understanding the situation and proving that at Go First 'You Come First'.

We are always there for you💙

The loss of a parent is devastating. Our passenger was very saddened by the demise of his father, who later wrote to us how our crew member Suraj consoled and comforted him like a brother after understanding the situation. https://t.co/EEBr0GOdbi

urls.title: Food & Beverage (Menu) - Go First
urls.description: Satisfy those cravings in-flight, by simply pre-booking your favourite snacks online or choose from our onboard refreshed menu. You can pick from an array of veg, non-veg, and Jain snacks to please your taste buds. Go First accepts credit/debit card payments on all domestic and international flights for on-board meal purchases. Please note that Diners Club and Amex cards are not accepted. Cash transactions are not applicable on international flights. Go First has added Raj Uphaar’s Raj Amrut rice chakri,

data.text:
Relax on the beach🏖️, in the spa💆🏻‍♂️, or at a resort😌, whatever your heart desires, Maldives is the place for you.
 
Enjoy the best of Maldives with irresistible GoHoliday packages! 
Book Now - https://t.co/i9D0I6FkoT https://t.co/HVpCUoKuav

Go First crew members make sure that the passengers are comfortable and at ease during their flight. Thank you #SakshiRawat #LuinntheiKashung #SumanGill #SapnaMetha for staying true to our commitment of #YouComeFirst.

Our passengers are our family💙
On June 9th, a mother-to-be travelled with us from Delhi to Pune and was overjoyed by the warm & special treatment received from the crew on-board. She also expressed her gratitude for treating her like a member of the family. https://t.co/YqddxEOvpt

🦈 se le kar 🐧, yahan sab dekhne ko milega! Known for its street life and cultural landmarks, the city is quite popular among travellers! 

Hint: It is officially known as Krung Thep https://t.co/tVH03fUfWj
What is the capital of Maldives?

urls.title: Go First -Independence Day Offer
urls.description: Get into travel mode and celebrate the joy of freedom with special fares on your flight tickets. Book your tickets on the GO FIRST mobile app between 18 th & 22 nd July 2022 and get a flat 16%* off by using the Promo code ‘SWEET16’. Travel Period – 12 th August 2022 – 31 st August 2022. This time, on his journey back from Dubai, he was given a warm welcome by the crew members and shared with us how happy he was to be flying GO FIRST again.
On May 8th, 2022, on a #Kannur to #Dubai #GOFIRST flight, the prompt action of the crew and Dr. Ahmed helped save the life of a fellow passenger who experienced a cardiac arrest mid-air.

What's up, Doc! So nice to see you again!

It was our pleasure to welcome back Dr. Shabeer Ahmed on-board our GO FIRST flight flying to Kannur. https://t.co/tWfcIUR880

data.text: Share your travel images by tagging @GoFirstairways to get featured.

Aaj ʟᴇʜ jaane ki zid N̶a̶ karo!

Leh should definitely be on every travellers bucket list. The snow capped mountains 🏔, winding roads 🚵‍♀️ and clear blue skies are definitely going to leave you spellbound. 
Just pack your bags and GO! https://t.co/ocDiY1Y3sV

GO Team GO!
Super proud to announce that GO FIRST has been awarded the 𝐌𝐨𝐬𝐭 𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐟𝐞𝐫𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐤𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐜𝐞 in Airlines, by @DailyMarksmen. 🏆

We truly believe in a positive & healthy work environment for our employees. After all, a joyful team spreads smiles. https://t.co/iMRQIRgph9

We have never met a superhero, but we have seen you! 
You help us fly, making us healthier 😊
#HappyDoctorsDay https://t.co/tORpF1jlVL

urls.title: Tue-Wed Flying Offer - Go First
urls.description: Tuesdays & Wednesdays just got better! Traveling on Tuesdays and Wednesdays was never so rewarding. Fly GO FIRST on Tuesday or Wednesday and you are in for some irresistible offers. Free meals Free seat selection Unlimited rescheduling* Complimentary food & confectionery hamper worth Rs. 1000 for a couple and Rs. 2000 for a group of 4 travelling on the same PNR. Booking Period – 02 nd June– 25 th Sep, 2022 Travel Period – 07 th June– 28 th Sep, 2022 The ticket can be rescheduled any number of times.
